import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const HeroSection = () => {

Create the Perfect Cover Letter in Minutes!

Tailored to Your Resume. Aligned with Any Job Description. Made for Students and Professionals.

} function LandingPage() { return (
{/* Hero Section */} {/* What is the Application? */}

What is the Cover Letter Generator?

Our Cover Letter Generator is a smart tool designed to help job seekers, especially final-year students and new graduates, craft tailored and impactful cover letters that stand out to employers. By analyzing your resume and the job description, it generates personalized content for every section of your cover letter.

{/* Replace 'app-screenshot.png' with your image path */}
{/* Scrolling Icon Section */}
{/* Left Column: Text and Scrolling Icons */}

No matter where you connect with people...

{/* Original Icons */} {[ "📄", // Resume "💼", // LinkedIn "✉️", // Email "📧", // Gmail "🖇️", // ATS "🔗", // Connection "📁", // File ].map((icon, index) => (
{icon}
))} {/* Duplicate Icons for Seamless Scrolling */} {[ "📄", "💼", "✉️", "📧", "🖇️", "🔗", "📁", ].map((icon, index) => (
{icon}
))} {/* Custom Icon */}
{/* Placeholder Image */}
{/* Duplicate Custom Icon for Seamless Scrolling */}
{/* Right Column: Additional Text */}

...always stay organized with our Cover Letter Generator.

{/* Keyframe Animation */}
{/* Why Should People Use It? */}

Why Use the Cover Letter Generator?

{/* Benefit Cards */} {[ { icon: '⏱️', title: 'Time-Saving', description: 'No more starting from scratch. Create a polished cover letter in minutes.' }, { icon: '🎯', title: 'Personalized', description: 'Tailors content to align with the job description and highlights your unique skills.' }, { icon: '📝', title: 'Guided Process', description: 'Step-by-step structure ensures you never miss an important section.' }, { icon: '✨', title: 'Customizable Options', description: 'Five content suggestions for each section, empowering you to choose what suits you best.' }, { icon: '🎓', title: 'Designed for Students & Grads', description: 'Created with new professionals in mind, focusing on ease of use.' }, ].map((benefit, index) => (
{benefit.icon}

{benefit.title}

{benefit.description}

))}
{/* How It Works */}

How Does It Work?

{/* Steps */} {[ { icon: '📄', title: 'Upload Your Resume', description: 'Simply upload your resume and paste the job description.' }, { icon: '🔍', title: 'Get a Skill Match', description: 'View a detailed comparison table to identify key alignments.' }, { icon: '✍️', title: 'Customize Your Cover Letter', description: 'Select personalized options for each section—Open Hook, Key Experiences, Closing Statement, and more.' }, { icon: '📥', title: 'Download or Copy', description: 'Get a professional, ready-to-use cover letter that you can edit further.' }, ].map((step, index) => (
{step.icon}

{step.title}

{step.description}

))}
{/* Real-World Use Cases */}

Who Can Benefit?

  • Final-year students applying for internships or entry-level jobs.
  • Professionals transitioning into new careers.
  • Anyone looking to save time and write better cover letters.
{/* Testimonials */}

What Our Users Say

{[ { quote: '“This tool helped me get my dream internship. The process was so easy!”', author: 'Sarah, Columbia University Student' }, { quote: '“I used to struggle with cover letters, but now I can focus on my applications.”', author: 'John, Software Engineer' }, ].map((testimonial, index) => (

{testimonial.quote}

{testimonial.author}

))}
{/* Features Highlight */}

Features You’ll Love

{/* Feature Cards */} {[ { image: 'feature1.png', title: 'Skill Alignment Table', description: 'Shows how your resume aligns with the job description.' }, { image: 'feature2.png', title: 'Five Suggestions per Section', description: 'Choose from multiple tailored options for each part of the letter.' }, { image: 'feature3.png', title: 'In-Place Editing', description: 'Edit your cover letter directly in the tool before downloading.' }, { image: 'feature4.png', title: 'Customizable Format', description: 'Download as Word or copy to your clipboard.' }, ].map((feature, index) => (
{/* Replace 'featureX.png' with your image paths */}

{feature.title}

{feature.description}

))}
{/* Why Choose Us Over Others? */}

Why Choose Our Tool?

Ready to Land Your Dream Job?

No credit card required. Start creating your personalized cover letter in minutes.

); } export default LandingPage;
